page.title: 12RECREATION AT SOUTHSEA
page.content: In the summer there are a lot of elderly people who like to stroll along the beach or sit and watch the sea. We spoke to several joggers who said they were keeping fit.{Metal {detecting}is also a pastime.(It seems that after storms, valuables such as rings and coins are uncovered and washed up on the beach.) { Fishing}appears to be popular on the pier(allowed from May-October)and along the beach we saw swimmers,small fishing boats,sailing and paddle boats.(The last are worked by the feet like a bicycle.){Windsurfing}(using a sail on a surfboard) is popular between South Parade Pier and Eastney Barracks. Many people we spoke to had come from other parts of England(the big cities particularly) and from other countries such as France, Italy and America.
